What are you looking for? Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Dining Out > Fast Food > Resolved Question Ric Flair Member since: May 31, 2009 Total points: 455 (Level 2) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » How is Domino's supposed to get feedback on their chicken? When everyone is just going to throw the box away 1 year ago Report Abuse by Amber Peterson Member since: March 24, 2011 Total points: 161 (Level 1) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Voters well i work for dominos pizza and i would love feed back on the chicken. when you make an order you get and order number on a sticky tag on your box. take that off the box and go online to www.domino's.com and there is an order tracker enter in your order number and it will ask you question about your order and you can rate the food and the driver and leave feedback. Source(s): I work for dominos 1 year ago Report Abuse 100% 4 Votes 1 person rated this as good
